Home > United States > Florida (FL) > Vero Beach > Vero Beach Restaurants > Casey's Place
All 138 Vero Beach Restaurants» Casey's Place 917 Azalea Ln , Vero Beach , FL 32963-1948 772-231-4790 Menu Ranked #32 of 138 restaurants in Vero Beach 33 Reviews Price range: $5 - $10 Cuisines: Armenian, Fast Food 10 visitor photos Restaurant details Update restaurant details Write a Review 33 reviews from our community 81% Recommend Excellent 12 Very good 15 Average 5 Poor 1 Terrible 0 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 33 reviews sorted by Date Rating English first Any DebbyLynn_68 Sebastian, Florida Senior Reviewer 7 reviews Reviews in 2 cities “a good go to spot” Reviewed June 17, 2012 It is always good, not outstanding but reliable choice for a quick burger or sandwich Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 4 more reviews by DebbyLynn_68 for Vero Beach 2349cortez Vero Beach, Florida 2 reviews “Love it!” Reviewed June 7, 2012 Great casual restaurant for lunch! Can always count on a great meal at a good price. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? LEvoyeur Vero Beach, Fl Top Contributor 70 reviews Reviews in 7 cities 31 helpful votes “Outside eating with strangers at your table” Reviewed May 26, 2012 The food is average, I had a 1/4 lb hot dog. It was hot and okay, if you wish to eat outside at noon the place is fairly busy with public tables that seat up to 6 comfortably. Interesting Vero landmark...a billionaire could be sitting with a construction worker at the same table. Normal Burger and sandwich fare at average... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 34 more reviews by LEvoyeur for Vero Beach LEvoyeur has 1 more review of Casey's Place “Average Casual Outside Lunch restaurant” Reviewed January 15, 2012 VictoriaLivestoPLAY Vero Beach Senior Contributor 36 reviews Reviews in 8 cities 11 helpful votes “Try the chicken tenders” Reviewed May 13, 2012 There is a reason this place has a line around the corner! Plus its really cute on St. Pattys day Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 15 more reviews by VictoriaLivestoPLAY for Vero Beach Foodie2D Vero Beach, Florida Senior Reviewer 7 reviews Reviews in 5 cities 3 helpful votes “Casey's - Everytime is a Good Time” Reviewed April 27, 2012 Been going here for over ten years, Great sandwiches and fries, very relaxing beach atmosphere, its like going on a beach vacation in my home town! Great for decompressing, Love it. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? John S Vero Beach, Florida Contributor 16 reviews Reviews in 2 cities 5 helpful votes “Everything a beach place should be!” Reviewed March 22, 2012 1 person found this review helpful Casey's is the place that every good beach town needs. Great burgers and fries, excellent specials and fun, outdoor, picnic seating. There is always a wait and it is worth it. Casey's gets it right everytime and they just make you leave full and happy! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 13 more reviews by John S for Vero Beach FloridaLolabunny florida Senior Contributor 28 reviews Reviews in 14 cities 9 helpful votes “LOVE THIS PLACE!!!!!!!!” Reviewed March 20, 2012 When you want a good fresh burger this is your place! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 7 more reviews by FloridaLolabunny for Vero Beach cbspuches miami Contributor 12 reviews Reviews in 8 cities 25 helpful votes “Fun little place” Reviewed March 18, 2012 Outdoor huger joint...great food. Informal and good for kids. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 3 more reviews by cbspuches for Vero Beach derekl205 Senior Contributor 25 reviews Reviews in 5 cities 4 helpful votes “Landmark burger stand” Reviewed March 10, 2012 This place has been a beachside cornerstone for years. The burgers here are great, but they do have other items on the menu. Like sausage and peppers or grilled chicken breast sandwich. I always get a burger. Definitely worth a visit. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 14 more reviews by derekl205 for Vero Beach mentalfloss111 Senior Reviewer 6 reviews Reviews in 3 cities 9 helpful votes “Best Fast Food In Town” Reviewed March 4, 2012 1 person found this review helpful We love Casey's Place! For great fast food get in line. The wait time is short even when the lines are a bit long. The staff is very efficient , when stepping up to the window be sure you know what you want to order. Everything is made fresh to order. The burgers, tuna sandwiches, cajun chicken plate and french... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review?
